title: University Hubs
content: We operate university hubs across Australia that engage students in education and discussion on technology and society issues. Through these hubs, we foster informed, critical engagement with the societal impacts of emerging technologies.

title: Student Led Research
content: We conduct research and support youth-led projects across disciplines, including computer science, AI trust and safety, AI ethics, and technology policy, law, and regulation.

title: Policy Advocacy
content: We give youth a voice to Australian policy issues by running tech policy engagement programs and publishing policy recommendations.
